greeting: Greetings from The On-Line Encyclopedia of Integer Sequences! http://oeis.org/

results.name: Persistence of n for sort-and-subtract (A193581).
comment: Number of sort-and-subtract steps to reach 0 when starting with n.
link: Reinhard Zumkeller, Table of n, a(n) for n = 0..10000
program: a193582 n = length $ takeWhile (> 0) $ iterate a193581 n
results.author: _Reinhard Zumkeller_, Aug 10 2011
